title: Modeling Showdown!?
detail_text: <:th_ch0204/>Hmm, so this is a store you recommend, huh, Eli-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Yes. Did you know this place, Karin?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>No, I didn’t. But it’s lovely. I’d love to check out this place thoroughly.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Fufu, I’m glad. You took Honoka to one of the stores you recommended the other day, right, Karin? I thought you might also like this place based on what Honoka told me.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Yeah, that did happen. That day was fun~. I got Honoka-chan to try on all kinds of stuff.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Honoka was also happy. She said, “I got to be Karin-san’s model! A model of a fashion model!”.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Fufu. Then, would you like to be my model for today, Eli-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Eeeh!? Umm, I didn’t mean it like that....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>You have a nice figure, Eli-chan, so it’s worth it for me to try coordinating you. Alright, first of all.... Let’s try this shirt on!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Geez. Then you’ll be my model too, okay Karin!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
